subject: Re: [svn:perl6-synopsis] r14421 - doc/trunk/design/syn
body:
On 6/14/07, Damian Conway  wrote:
snip
> To get the multi-line quote, you'd need:
>
>     say :to(END);
>         =begin POD
>         blah blah blah
>         =end POD
>         END
>
> Damian
>

Would this work as well?

say :to(END);
\x{3D}begin POD
blah blah blah
\x{3D}end POD
END
